name: 呂志誠
objective: 先修課程：負責教授同意。簡介，生化感測器分類，生化感測材料，生化與觸媒反應機制，生物感測器之設計與製造，化學感測器之設計與製造，介面與校正方法，氣體感測器專題，微型與智慧型感測器，實驗室晶片概念，應用與未來展望。
schedule:
1　　Introduction
2　　Transduction theories of bio-chemical sensors
3　　Transduction theories of bio-chemical sensors
4　　Materials for bio-chemical sensing
5　　Performance factors
6　　Design of biosensors
7　　Design of chemical (gas) sensors
8　　Interface and calibration methods
9　　期中考
10　　Invited seminar session
11　　Specific applications
12　　Paper review 口頭報告
13　　Laboratory-on-chip (LOC) technology
14　　Electronic noses
15　　Summary , future trends and new frontier
16　　Invited seminar session or special topic discussions
17　　期末口頭報告
18　　期末口頭報告
scorePolicy:
Paper review & presentation : 30 %
Exam (for topics 1-7) : 30 %
Term project and presentation : 40 %
materials:
教科書 (Textbook)
B.R. Eggins, Chemical sensors and biosensors, 2002, Wiley, ISBN-0471899143.
參考書目 (References)
References :
1.P.T. Moseley and B.C. Tofield, Solid state gas sensors, 1987, Adam Hilger.
2.J.W. Gardner and P.N. Bartlett, Electronic noses, 1999, Oxford.
3.R.M. Rangayyan, Biomedical signal analysis, 2002, Wiley-Interscience.
4.C.H. Hamann, A Hamnett and Wolf Vielstich, Electrochemistry, 1998, Wiley-VCH.
